data.name: IVF Success Prediction with Large Language Models
data.description: üß† This project explores how LLMs can predict IVF success using clinical data from HFEA. It fine-tunes the Mistral-7B-Instruct model using PEFT and quantization for accuracy and efficiency.

data.name: PantryPal: A Mobile App for Low-Income Families
data.description: ü•´PantryPal helps low-income families plan nutritious meals using available ingredients. Built with Flutter and Firebase, it features recipe matching, pantry tracking, and local resource discovery.

data.name: CrowdStrike Driver Remediation on AWS
data.description: ‚òÅÔ∏è Automated large-scale remediation across AWS EC2 Windows servers to remove faulty CrowdStrike drivers. ‚öôÔ∏è Integrated AWS Systems Manager (SSM) for zero-downtime patching and auto-reboots. üì¶ Developed Python scripts with Boto3 for secure and reliable automation, reducing manual recovery time by 80%. üîí Ensured enterprise-grade cloud security compliance through proactive monitoring and validation.

data.name: Automated SSM Agent Deployment ‚Äì Linux Servers
data.description: ‚öôÔ∏è Built a Python automation pipeline to deploy and configure SSM Agents on Linux servers using AWS Boto3. ‚òÅÔ∏è Enabled centralized remote management, patching, and monitoring across multiple AWS accounts. üìä Reduced manual setup effort by 90% and improved cloud visibility through SSM dashboards. üß∞ Integrated GitHub workflows for version control and deployment tracking.

data.name: Microsoft Defender Vulnerabilities Automation
data.description: üîí Developed a Python-based automation framework to detect and remediate Microsoft Defender vulnerabilities across 500+ AWS servers. ‚öôÔ∏è Used AWS Boto3 for real-time patch management and alert-based execution. üì¶ Eliminated manual remediation by integrating automated ticket resolution workflows. üìà Increased security compliance rate to 99% with proactive vulnerability monitoring.

data.name: Upgrading SSM Agents ‚Äì Windows Servers
data.description: üìä Designed a Grafana-based monitoring system to track AWS SSM agent health across Windows servers. ‚öôÔ∏è Automated upgrades and implemented real-time alerting for failed installations. üß† Added self-healing scripts that re-install failed agents via AWS Lambda triggers. ‚òÅÔ∏è Improved observability and reduced downtime by 60% through predictive monitoring dashboards.
